bot_description:
Use /start to see the menu.
🎧 Ready to download music from Spotify!
bot_version_info:
⚙️ _Version: $1_
Developed with ❤️ by [@mralexsaavedra](https://mralexsaavedra.com)

donation_message:
This bot is an open-source project lovingly maintained in my free time. There are no premium features or hidden fees, just a lot of hard work. If you appreciate the effort and want to support development, you can do so with a donation.

[Make your contribution here](https://coff.ee/mralexsaavedra)
Thank you for your support! ❤️
download_prompt_url: 🔗 Please enter the Spotify URL of the song, album, artist, or playlist you want to download.
error_admins_group_only: ⚠️ You can only specify multiple admins if the bot is used in a group (using the TELEGRAM_GROUP variable).
error_download_failed: ❌ An error occurred during the download. Check the bot logs for more details.
error_generic: ❌ An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error_sync_file_invalid: ⚠️ Sync file is invalid or corrupted.
error_unknown_command: ❓ I don't recognize that command. Use /start to see available commands.
menu_main:
*🎙️ SpotDL Bot*
Download songs, albums, artists, or playlists directly from Spotify.

📌 *Available commands:*

• /download – Download a song, album, artist, or playlist using a Spotify URL.
• /downloadsavedsongs – Download all your liked songs in your library.
• /downloadsavedalbums – Download all albums saved in your library.
• /downloadsavedplaylists – Download all playlists saved in your library.
• /downloaduserplaylists – Download all playlists you have created.
• /downloaduserfollowedartists – Download the artists you follow on Spotify. *(INCOMING)*
• /sync – Sync your Spotify library and remove songs that are no longer in your playlists or albums.
• /version – Show the current bot version.
• /donate – Support development with a donation.

ℹ️ *Tip:* You can also send a Spotify URL directly to download it automatically.

💡 *Need help?* Use /start anytime to return to this menu.

⚠️ *Important:* To use this application, you must first authorize the bot using the /authorize command.
menu_option_donate: Support the project with a donation
menu_option_download_saved_albums: Download your saved albums from Spotify
menu_option_download_saved_playlists: Download all your saved playlists from Spotify
menu_option_download_saved_songs: Download all your liked songs from Spotify
menu_option_download_url: Download a song, album, or playlist from a URL
menu_option_download_user_followed_artis: Download the artists you follow on Spotify *(INCOMING)*
menu_option_download_user_playlists: Download all your created playlists on Spotify
